post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Dear Chil-Hoan:

I hope everything is going well with you. I would be happy to hear about your current status and career goals. If this message found you in error please accept my apologies, but feel free to send me your updated resume. This will enable me to look for suitable and challenging positions for you. Urgently, we are looking for a Production Application Support Consultant with experience supporting not only applications but also Unix (Solaris or HP), Windows, and relational databases.  Are you currently looking into exploring new contract opportunities?




If you already obtained a position through VTRAC, please disregard this message and kindly forward this message to your friends.

Please let me know if you are interested or you know anyone who might be interested in this position. (your name will remain confidential, and we will have bonus for you). Also, I would appreciate it if you could pass our company’s name and our Website www.vtrac.com to your friends who have strong expertise in PeopleSoft projects.

Thank you and best regards,

Robert Woodburn
VTRAC Corporation
366 Bay Street, Suite 500
Toronto, ON, M5H 4B2, Canada
Phone: (416) 366-2600 ext. 220
Fax: (416) 366-5550
E-Mail: robertw@vtrac.com
www.vtrac.com
post.title: Web Developer Opportunity
